column3: Tighten Wheel Lugs & check air presure in tires
Main Switch Panel Hook Up      No Stereo 45
Tail Lights - License Plate Light Installed
Outside Water Heater and Furnace Vent
Low point drains & water lines.     (std. unit)
Set Bath Wall and Drill Holes for Plumbing and Wiring
Install and Hook Up Front Plumbing Kit
Set Furnace and Install Furnace Vent
Finish installing shower (rivets) & shower head with accesseries
Set Furnace and Install Furnace Vent
Bend Down Edge of Metal Roof
Install Vents and Seal MaxAir Brackets
Install Plumbing and Vent Covers and Tail Pipes
Seal Under Front Radius and Down Front Edge
Upper Flow Thru Vent - Scene Light - Speakers
Wire Upper Cleanance and Loading Lights (Int. Hook Up)
cut first piece of flooring  (7' wide)
Set Wheel wells or Wheel Well Metal
Drill Plumbing Holes and Toilet Drains
Drill Holes for Gas Lines and Low Points
mark wall lines on floor/cover floor
Set Walls - Rear Header - Front Walls
Set Interior Front Wall and Cage
VBH on End Tubes and at Wheels
Install 1st Piece of Azdel On Each Side of Sidewall
Fasten Backers for Ducting and Above Cove
cut all holes for switches & recepts
Grind; tape; flip; weld; grind C/S sidewall
Grind; tape; flip; weld; grind R/S sidewall
Tank wiring and plumbing hook up
Run fuel lines & carb canister for Gen
Run Fuel Line for Filling Station
Install Jacks; Sewer Hose; Spare Tire Rack; sewage hose holder
Fresh Water Fill and Vent Hoses
